organic.snippet: CBV heals the trauma of sexual assault and domestic violence by providing crisis intervention, safety, advocacy, and education to survivors and our community.

organic.title: What should you do in a situation of domestic violence? - hilfe-info.de
organic.snippet: Physical and psychological violence often takes place “at home,” that is, in couple relationships but also in other family and close relationships.

organic.title: Community Beyond Violence in Grass Valley, CA - Domestic Shelters
organic.snippet: Community Beyond Violence is a domestic violence service near Grass Valley, CA providing help for people dealing with domestic abuse. Call 530-272-3467.
